description.value:
Prerequisite: Dragonborn, warden

Benefit: When you use your dragon breath racial power, you can choose to mark each target. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.

Update (6/14/2010)

At the end of the Benefit line, add "The mark lasts until the end of your next turn."

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 140.
